Don't you trust me with the money?$a#$b#I thought we were better friends than that...$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 500/emote Alex 28/pause 400/speak Alex "I just wanted to do something nice...$s"/pause 800/end dialogue Alex "I don't want to talk to you right now...$s"
Entries.giveAlexMoney: pause 200/addMailReceived gaveAlexMoney/money -5000/emote Alex 32/pause 500/speak Alex "Great! Swing by the Saloon on Sunday and I'll show you the end result!$h"/pause 500/end

Entries.928202237/e 928202236/n saloonSportsRoom: distantBanjo/-100 -100/farmer 31 20 0 Alex 32 7 0 Shane 33 8 0 Gus 34 8 0 Kent 35 8 0 George 36 7 0/addConversationTopic AlexSportsRoom 7/skippable/specificTemporarySprite gridballGameTV/viewport 34 7 true/move farmer 0 -13 1 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Alex "Big play!"/pause 600/jump Gus/pause 2000/textAboveHead George "Score!"/pause 400/textAboveHead Alex "There we go!"/faceDirection Kent 3 true/faceDirection Gus 1 true/animate Gus false true 100 22/animate Kent false true 100 17/shake Gus 500/shake Kent 500/pause 500/textAboveHead George "Atta boy!"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Gus/stopAnimation Kent/faceDirection Kent 0 true/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 400/speak Alex "Hey, @! You made it!$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "So... what do you think?"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Alex 3/speak Alex "I've been thinking... You know how my dream is to become a professional athlete someday?#$b#Well, it's looking like that dream is a bit further away than I expected...$9#$b#I'm still working towards it, don't get me wrong!$h#$b#...But I thought it would be cool to have a place where us guys could hang out and watch the Sunday game. Gus liked the idea so much he offered me part of his back room!#$b#This way, I can remind myself of that dream, when it feels like it's far away."/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/speak George "You did good, son. I could watch this at home, but coming here makes me feel young again!$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "Thanks, Grandpa."/pause 500/speak Kent "I'm happy to get out of the house and socialize with people again.$h"/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 100/textAboveHead Shane "Same"/pause 1200/speak Gus "I'm having a lot of fun. And it's good for business!$h#$b#Though maybe not so good for George's heart...$s"/pause 100/faceDirection George 2 true/emote George 16/pause 500/textAboveHead George "Now see here!"/pause 500/emote Alex 32/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/message "It seems the guys have a new Sunday tradition."/pause 1000/message "5,000g well spent!"/pause 1000/end dialogue Alex "Thanks again for the money, @. It was a fun project for me, and all the guys seem happy with it!"

Entries.928202238/f Alex {{FriendshipRequiredHea: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Alex 64 18 0/pause 700/speak Alex "Hey, @!$h"/pause 500/speak Alex "I've got some big news... An agent from the Grampleton Timberwolves contacted me about tryouts!#$b#I'll be taking the bus over to Grampleton Stadium.#$b#Gramps and Granny are gonna come cheer me on and... if you're free, it'd mean a lot to me if you could come as well.$l"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/speak Alex "We'll be leaving around 12pm, so meet us at the bus stop if you want to. See you!"/pause 500/end

Entries.928202240/e 928202239/o Alex/w sunny/A A: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Alex 64 18 0/pause 700/speak Alex "Hey, @! I got a call from the Timberwolves' coach this morning.#$b#He said they decided to pass on me this year...$s#$b#...but they were really impressed with how I played!#$b#If I come back for the next tryout, there's a good chance they'll take me on."/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Alex "So I'm going to keep training and practicing every chance I get, so that when tryouts come around again, I'll be ready.$h"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 700/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Despite the bad news, Alex looks proud of himself, looking forward to the future."/end
